roleTypes.title: Admin
roleTypes.description: Has full access to the internal group settings provided by the Super Admin, can invite users to the group

roleTypes.title: Creator
roleTypes.description: Has access to customer support features and view only

roleTypes.title: Customer Support
roleTypes.description: Has access to create, update within the scope of module provided access to. Manager can launch campaigns

roleTypes.title: Manager
roleTypes.description: Has access to create, update within the scope of modules provided access to. Creator may not launch campaigns
